name: Celestial Dreamer
description:
The Goddess of War Rhea-Tralluru has slept for tens of thousands of years.  Now, as fate calls her once again into action, she attempts to wake.  But, a sentient sliver of a shattered reality stands in her way, hoping to use the Slumbering Goddess as its vessel to cast the world into shadow.  ...Again.  

Celestial Dreamer is a boss-gauntlet platformer.  Face a wide array of diverse, challenging boss encounters using six different playable characters.  Earn medals for passing boss milestones, weaken the Void's gasp on the Goddess' slumber, and ultimately - escape.  

Current status of 0.7:

12 boss encounters, 11 of which have both easy and challenge modes.

All six characters playable.

WIP:

More encounters.  Upon completion, the project will have at least 20.

Visual effects from tiles to sprites to particle effects are all in various stages of development.  Sound Effects, too.

BGM is on hold.

Final boss and ending.
